name: Glitch is coming
description:
Made for HEJ game jam - March.

Theme: Glitch

Game is around 100 MB. It takes time to load in.  

Web version might have lower performance compared to downloadable versions.

Brave, Chrome, Chromium have good performance. Firefox is lagging.

Thanks for the awesome music:

Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio
